com.defano.jmonet.tools.brushes

Class ShapeStroke

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.defano.jmonet.tools.brushes.StampStroke
      • com.defano.jmonet.tools.brushes.ShapeStroke
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Stroke

    public class ShapeStroke
extends StampStroke
    A brush whose tip is a user-provided shape. Produces a stroke where every point on the stroked path is "stamped" with a filled shape.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ShapeStroke(Collection<Shape> shapes) 
      ShapeStroke(Shape shape)
      Produces a brush of given shape.

    • Method Detail

      • stampPoint

        public void stampPoint(GeneralPath path,
                       Point point)
        Stamps a given point on a stroked shape's path.

        This method should append zero or more shapes to given the path, each of which represents the mark that the "pen" should leave at this point on the path. Typically, the stamped shape should be translated such that it's center- point is located at the given point.

        Specified by:
        stampPoint in class StampStroke
        Parameters:
        path - A path of the stroked shape
        point - A point in the given path that should be stroked.
